testcase.classname: Verify the Cost of the Product
testcase.name: Verify the cost of product in the list page and details page are the same
testcase.system-out: Given I am on live Guru Page................................................passed When I click Mobile Menu....................................................passed Then I read the list of all mobile and read the cost of Sony Xperia Mobile..passed Then I click on Sony Xperia Mobile..........................................passed Then I read the Sony Xperia Mobile from detail Page.........................passed Then I compare the value of both Page.......................................passed Then close Browser..........................................................passed
